title: Iphone 14
description: The new iPhone 14 series is finally here. The new iPhones feature a beautiful and durable design, a new cinematic mode, gorgeous display changes, an A15 bionic chip, advanced security features, a huge leap in battery life and so much more. Not an iPhone user? It's so easy to switch to iPhone.

title: MacBook Air M2
description: Supercharged by the next-generation M2 chip, the redesigned MacBook Air combines incredible performance and up to 18 hours of battery life into its strikingly thin aluminum enclosure.

title: MacBook Pro
description: The new MacBook Pro delivers game-changing performance for pro users. Choose the powerful M1 Pro or the even more powerful M1 Max to supercharge pro-level workflows while getting amazing battery life.1 And with an immersive 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display and an array of pro ports, you can do more than ever with MacBook Pro.2
